hero.title: Send files instantly — no accounts, no limits, no hassle.
hero.description: AltSendme lets you send files directly from your computer to anyone, anywhere.
hero.airdropQuote: Think of it like AirDrop for everyone.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple. Secure. Instant.

step1.title: Drop your file or folder.
step1.description: AltSendme creates a one-time share code (called a "ticket").

step2.title: Share the ticket.
step2.description: Copy it and send it to your friend — via chat, email, or text.

step3.title: They receive it directly.
step3.description: Your friend pastes the ticket in their app, and the transfer begins.
step3.note: No uploads, no waiting, no accounts — just a private connection between you two.

howItWorks.privacyNote: Transfers are direct and encrypted — your data never touches a server.

private.title: Private & Encrypted
private.description: Files go straight to your friend — never stored anywhere online.

fast.title: Fast Transfers
fast.description: Uses your full internet speed, even faster on local Wi-Fi.

unlimited.title: Unlimited File Size
unlimited.description: Send gigabytes of data — no limits, no subscriptions.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform
crossPlatform.description: Works on Windows, macOS, and Linux.

resumable.title: Resumable Downloads
resumable.description: Transfers pick up automatically if they're interrupted.

testimonial.title: What People Are Saying
testimonial.quote: A very straightforward file transfer app. Great for quick, simple file transfers across the web.

download.title: Download AltSendme
download.subtitle: Free, Open Source, and Available for Everyone
download.tagline1: Your files. Your privacy. Your speed.
download.tagline2: No accounts. No tracking. No nonsense.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: AltSendme connects your devices directly using encrypted peer-to-peer channels (TLS 1.3 + QUIC).
privacy.noData: No data ever passes through third-party servers.
privacy.onlyYou: Only you and your recipient can see the file names and sizes before transfer.
privacy.learnMore: Learn more about our privacy approach →

taglineFooter.quote: It's like a private, one-time AirDrop link — for anyone, anywhere.

meta.title: Send files anywhere | Frictionless, Fast, Private, Unlimited and Free
meta.description: AltSendme is a frictionless peer-to-peer file transfer cross-platform desktop application. Send files and directories over the internet with no account requirements, end-to-end encryption, unlimited transfers, and full privacy control. Available for Windows, macOS, and Linux.
